snippet: The shooting at a Planned Parenthood clinic was eclipsed days later by the massacre in San Bernardino, Calif. There are mixed feelings about the loss of attention.
abstract: Residents of Colorado Springs continue to recover from horror of Planned Parenthood facility shooting, even as national focus has shifted to San Bernardino, Calif, terrorist attack; three people were killed and nine wounded in clinic attack, and emotions in town, where population is split between conservative and liberal viewpoints, remain raw.
lead_paragraph: The shooting at a Planned Parenthood clinic was eclipsed days later by the massacre in San Bernardino, Calif. There are mixed feelings about the loss of attention.

headline.main: Colorado Springs Deals With Mass Killing as Nation Moves On
headline.print_headline: Colorado Springs Tries to Recover as Nation Moves On
